content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 wrap yourself in the colours that make you happiest no need to explain or overthink - just pick the first three that jump out to you the glee shawl is a simple pleasure to knit the luxurious blend of alpaca merino and silk elevates this combination of stripes garter and a modular asymmetric construction we added pompoms at the end - for pure gleeful whimsy
